content: DSH 700-X Gas cut-off saw Versatile rear-handle 70 cc gas saw with auto-choke – cutting depth up to 5 with a 14 blade ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Concrete saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features The most versatile gas cut-off saw weve ever made – cut up to 5 deep with a 14 blade, and even convert to flush-cut mode Easy-start gas saw – unique auto-choke helps to make first-pull ignition the norm, and flooded engines virtually impossible Robust – upgraded air filters and re-engineered internal components help the gas saw to deliver uninterrupted, high performance Easy self-service maintenance – pre-tensioned belt and virtually unbreakable starter rope help to minimize the saws maintenance downtime Compatible with the DSH-P water pump – feeds water to your gas saw from any source, no pressurization needed Applications Construction work – cutting out openings in brick or concrete walls Metalwork – cutting steel profiles, pipes and steel sheets Laying paving – cutting curbstones and paving slabs to size Masonry work – cutting bricks and blocks to size Floor construction – cutting expansion joints in fresh concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Motor cylinder: 68.7 cm³ Rated power: 3.5 kW Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Motor cylinder | 68.7 cm³ | Rated power | 3.5 kW | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 31.8 x 10.3 x 17.1 in | Fuel mixture | 50:1 (2% oil) | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 99 dB (A) | 1 | Disc diameter | 14 in | Cutting depth | 5 in | Triaxial vibration value for cutting concrete slab (ah) | 4.9 m/s² | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3628976 - DSH 700-X Pallet (8) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 8x DSH 700-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 3538196 - DSH700-X + 3P Diamond Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 3x Cutting disc P-S 14/1 - 3538194 - DSH700-X + 1SPX Diamond Blade - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 1x Cutting Disc EQD SPX 14x1 univ. - 3538195 - DSH700-X + 2SP Diamond Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 2x Cutting disc SP-S 14x1 universal - 3538197 - DSH700-X + 10 Abrasive Blades - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 10x Cutting disc 14x5/32x20 MD SPX - 3612913 - DSH 700-X 14 +SPX Metal Cutting Diamond Blade - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-X 14 Hand-held gas saw - 1x Cutting disc 14x1 SPX metal - 2265864 - DSH 700-X 14 Gen.3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-X 14 Hand-held gas saw
